extends java.lang.Object

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    SlotDevCards()
    the constructor initialize the matrix as 3*3 as written in the rules even though the player can't buy more than seven cards

  • Constructor Details

    • SlotDevCards

      public SlotDevCards()
      the constructor initialize the matrix as 3*3 as written in the rules even though the player can't buy more than seven cards

  • Method Details

    • canBuyDevCard

      public boolean canBuyDevCard​(DevelopmentCard d, int column)
      this method check if the player can buy a specific level card from the development card market
      Parameters:
      d - the card received that the method check if the player can buy it just for the level, not for the resources
      Returns:
      the maximum level of player's cards

    • insertCards

      public boolean insertCards​(int column, DevelopmentCard card) throws GameFinishedException
      when player buy a development card this method insert the card in the boardCards
      Parameters:
      column - the column where player wants put the card just bought in accord with the rules
      card - the card just bought.
      Throws:
      GameFinishedException

    • checkUsage

      public boolean checkUsage​(DevelopmentCard card)
      this method check if the card selected from the player to be used is on the top of the heap
      Parameters:
      card - the card that player selected

    • baseProduction

      public void baseProduction​(Resources wanted)
      constant for each board, is the base production
      Parameters:
      wanted - the resources wanted, it is added to the buffer

      this method call the card and start the production
      Parameters:
      card - the card whose production player want to start

    • getDevCards

      public DevelopmentCard getDevCards​(int x, int y)
      this method is a get from the boardDevCards leave an NullPointerException exception if the slot is empty
      Parameters:
      x - row
      y - column
      Returns:
      the corresponding DevelopmentCard

      public int countTotalNumberDevCards()
